resources.string: Please enter Email and Birth Date and click on \"Send Reset Password Link\" button.
Please provide details below to create your new Medlynk account
A confirmation email is sent to you
Medlynk will assist you in providing information to your doctor.
On the next screen, you will be able to search for your doctor\'s account. Don\'t worry if you can\'t find their account number, you will still be able to use Medlynk. We\'ll guide you through this.
Go to question set already in progress
Or select a doctor identification number (ID) that you searched before:
I DON\'T KNOW MY DOCTOR ID
In preparation for your doctor appointment, please select an option below that most closely matches the reason for your visit

This questionnaire will collect some important background information from you regarding any medication you need a refill for. You will be prompted to complete it once for EACH medication that you need refilled.
What if I have more to discuss?
What if none of the options are suitable for my appointment?

Using the button below you can still access all the question sets, and fill in your responses. At the end, you will have the option to PRINT your information. You will need a printer on your local network to do this.

Once you have printed your information, bring this with you to your doctor appointment, and provide the printout to reception as soon as you arrive. Although we cannot make any guarantees, the vast majority of offices will take your printout, and your doctor will have the opportunity to review this before beginning your visit.
When you print your information, it will not only show your responses, but also a medical style note that is formatted in a way that is easy for your doctor to review.
Got it! Next time when I click on the link \"I don\'t know my doctor ID\", skip the current page.

string.name: see_more_new_symptom_first_question
string.b: (For now, try to pick the most bothersome symptom only.)

resources.string: What is the main symptom that is concerning you today?
Please briefly describe if you think there was something that made the symptom start (such as an injury)?
How long ago did this symptom start?\n(* if this has been a recurrent symptom, please focus on the CURRENT episode only for now)
How frequently does this symptom bother you?
Please describe how your symptom affects you on your best days.
Is there anything you have noted that makes the symptom worse?\n(Ex - rest, sleep, eating, fluid intake, exercise)
Please list any other symptoms you are having that you are concerned may be related to this one.
Please indicate what treatments you have tried so far (please select all treatments previously tried):
Any recent changes in your regular medications?
Any new supplements/non-prescribed herbs etc that you recently started taking?
What makes you particularly concerned about this symptom today? (can pick more than one here)
Have you had this symptom in the past?
How long does the symptom last when it occurs?
What makes you particularly concerned about this particular episode? (can pick more than one here)
Please list any medications you have tried forpast episodes:
Please indicate what treatments you have tried for past episodes (please select all treatments previously tried):
You have just completed a New Symptom questions!

string-array.name: question_6_7_choices
string-array.item: Can not get out of bed
Can do a few simple chores \n at home, but not much more
Can do chores at home but cannot get out to do very much
Can go out but cannot manage any errands
Can go out, but cannot manage manage some errands
Can go out, do errands, but nothing intense, and do exercise
Can go out, do errands and light exercise, but no strenuous exercise
Can do whatever I usually do

string-array.name: question_8_choices
string-array.item: Haven't noted anything that makes it worse

string-array.name: question_9_choices
string-array.item: Haven't noted anything that makes it worse

string-array.name: question_12_choices
string-array.item: New or worsening fatigue together with the main symptom today

string-array.name: question_17_choices
string-array.item: Not comfortable with it/want it to go away
Afraid it is something serious like cancer
Family member urging me to have it evaluated
Worried it will cause my trouble on my upcomig trip

string-array.name: question_19_after_years_choices
string-array.item: Has occurred a few times or less ever

string-array.name: question_20_other_chocies
string-array.item: first">Always there - all day/wakes me at night
All day, but I can sleep at night

string-array.name: question_21_choices
string-array.item: Just need reassurance that nothing else needs to be done
Afraid it means I have cancer
Starting to interfere with my activities
I just can't take it anymore

resources.string: To review the results of a test
Which symptom is still troubling you today (Please list one symptom only)
Please list any other symptoms you are having that you believe are associated:
How has your symptom changed since your last visit here?
How frequently has your symptom bothered you since your last visit?
How long does the symptom last when it occurs?
How intense is the symptom since your last visit?
On your worst day, how are your symptoms interfering with your abilities?
On your best day, how are your symptoms interfering with your abilities?
Is there anything you have noted that makes the symptom better?\n(Ex - rest, sleep, eating, fluid intake, exercise, being inside/outside, temperature outside, air quality)
Is there anything you have noted that makes the symptom worse?\n(Ex - rest, sleep, eating, fluid intake, exercise)
Please indicate what treatments you have tried so far (please select all treatments previously tried):
Have you seen another medical doctor regarding this symptom?
Since your last visit with me have you had any of the following tests for this symptom?
How worried are you about your symptoms?
To review a symptom that was previously discussed

string-array.name: follow_up_symptoms_4th_choices
string-array.item: Occurs a few time per week
Has Occurred a few times ever

string-array.name: follow_up_symptoms_5th_choices
string-array.item: Is always there - all day / wakes me at night
Is there all day, but I can sleep at night

string-array.name: follow_up_symptoms_7th_8th_choices
string-array.item: Can not get out of bed
Can do a few simple chores \n at home, but not much more
Can do chores at home but cannot get out to do very much
Can go out but cannot manage any errands
Can go out, but cannot manage manage some errands
Can go out, do errands, but nothing intense, and do exercise
Can go out, do errands and light exercise, but no strenuous exercise
Can do whatever I usually do

resources.string: Have not noted anything that makes it worse
What is the name of the first medication you need to refill today? (If you can, please list names, if not, at least list the type of medication, such as ‘blood pressure pills’, or ‘diabetes pills’)
How regularly have you been taking your medication?
Are there any side effects you think you are having from the medication?
How have your symptoms changed on the medication?
Are you satisfied with the medication overall?
For blood pressure medications, please let me know if/when you last checked your blood pressure on your own:
Has cost of the medication been a significant problem for you?
For blood pressure medications, please let me know if/when you last checked your blood pressure on your own:
